data.title: Shiner Beer Run
data.meta_description: The Shiner Beer Run is on Saturday November 16, 2024. It includes the following events: 1/2 Marathon, 10K Run, 5K Run, and Partner Pass (21+).
data.text:
Please join us for the 13th annual running of The Shiner Beer Run, benefiting the Boot Campaign! You can challenge yourself on the gently rolling hills through downtown, the surrounding neighborhoods, scenic Green-Dickson Park, the beautiful country side and the majestic Manure Mile in Historic Shiner, Texas with the Half Marathon, 10k or 5k.

All proceeds from the event are donated to The Boot Campaign. We can't wait to see you in Shiner!

All races have 15 different age group awards starting with 14 & under, 15-19, 20-24, 20 & under, 21-24, 25-29, 30-34, 35-39, 40-44, 45-49, 50-54, 55-59, 60-64, 65-69, and 70+. Also awarded are individual race Top Overall (Male and Female) and Top Overall Masters.**

**Note: Overall & Masters winners times are determined by GUN TIME vs. age group winners determined by BIB TIME. If you know you are a contender for an Overall or Masters award, we HIGHLY encourage you to get to the FRONT of the group! If you have any questions regarding this please contact results@iruntexas.net

Bring your RV and stay in Green Dixon Municipal Park for the night or a weekend getaway. Located at 65 County Road 350

Shiner, TX 77984 361-594-3362

After the race hang out at the brewery for live music, ice cold Shiner Beer and good old home cooking. You can also sign up for the Spoetzl Brewery and Distillery Tour.

General information about tours is available online at Shiner.com

Any questions about results, race timing, etc. please contact results@iruntexas.net
